div.h2: Prospective Parent Tour (Cancelled due to Covid-19)

li.span: Comments Off on Prospective Parent Tour (Cancelled due to Covid-19)

img.br:
Thank you for your interest in HSA Belmont. Please sign up to join us on a tour on one of the following dates:
January 16, at 8:30 am (all grades)
January 21, 5:00 pm (kindergarten only)
January 30, at 8:30 am (all grades)
February 4, 5:00 pm (kindergarten only)
February 13, at 8:30 am (all grades)
February 27, at 8:30 am (all grades)

div.p: You will have an opportunity to see our students in their classrooms at all levels, plus our art, technology, music, and PE facilities.

Our school is at 2456 N. Mango. The entrance is easily reached by driving one block west on Fullerton to Menard (northbound one-way). The school’s parking lot will be on the right. Street parking is generally plentiful however be aware some areas around the perimeter are zoned as no parking. The main doors (labeled “#1”) are located within the parking lot (the doors are facing north).
Tours start promptly at 8:30 and finish in 60-75 minutes depending on the number of questions.
If you sign up then decide you won’t be able to make the tour, please delete your name in case others are interested.
